a2 b2 c2 d3
a3 b3 c3 d3

iii) B → C

Department (DNo, Dname, strength, Dtype)
Journal (Jname, ISSN, frequency, year_of_inception)
Publication (TID, ISSN, No_of_paper, VolumeNo, Month, Year)
Write the relational algebra queries for the following:
i. Find the name of the teacher who has published in the journal named 'IJMDM'.
ii. Find the total number of papers published by the teacher whose name is Prof. Ramesh in 2019.
iii. Find the department name of the teachers who publish in journals whose year of inception is 2002.
iv. Find the name of the teacher who has the highest number of publications.
